entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
